7. ê¸€ì„ ë§ˆì¹˜ë©°

í•™êµ í”„ë¡œì íŠ¸ë¥¼ í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ì‹œì‘í•œ ë¡œë³´ì½”ë“œì˜€ë‹¤. ë°¤ì„ ìƒˆì›Œê°€ë©° ì—¬ëŸ¬ ì‚¬ì´íŠ¸ë¥¼ ëŒì•„ë‹¤ë‹ˆê³ , ëª‡ ì‹œê°„ì”© ì´í´ë¦½ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ë¶™ì¡ê³  ì˜¤ë¥˜ì™€ ì”¨ë¦„í•˜ë©° ì§€ëƒˆë‹¤. í”„ë¡œì íŠ¸ë¥¼ ë§ˆì¹˜ë©´ì„œ ì§€ê¸ˆì—ì„œì•¼ í¸í•˜ê²Œ ê¸€ì„ ì“¸ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

JAVAë¥¼ ê³µë¶€í•˜ë©´ì„œ ë‹¨ìˆœí•œ ì˜ˆì œê°€ ì•„ë‹Œ ì¡°ê·¸ë§Œ ê·œëª¨ì˜ í”„ë¡œì íŠ¸ë¥¼ í•˜ë©° ê³µë¶€í•˜ê³  ì‹¶ì„ ë•Œ, ì¬ë¯¸ì—†ëŠ” ì˜ˆì œê°€ ì•„ë‹ˆë¼ ëˆˆì— ë³´ì´ëŠ” ì¬ë¯¸ìˆëŠ” ì˜ˆì œë¥¼ ê³µë¶€í•˜ê³  ì‹¶ì„ ë•Œë¼ë©´ ì´ ë¡œë³´ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ê³µë¶€í•˜ë©´ ì¢‹ì„ ê²ƒ ê°™ë‹¤.

ì´ í”„ë¡œì íŠ¸ë¥¼ í•˜ë©´ì„œ ìˆ˜ì—†ì´ ë³´ê²Œ ëœ Fermetë¼ëŠ” ì±”í”¼ì–¸ì´ ìˆë‹¤. ì´ ì±”í”¼ì–¸ì˜ ì†ŒìŠ¤ì½”ë“œ ì•ˆì—ëŠ” ìƒì†, ì…ì¶œë ¥, ë©€í‹°ì“°ë ˆë”© ë“± ìë°”ë¥¼ ë°°ìš°ë©´ì„œ ì–´ë ¤ìš´ ë¶€ë¶„ë“¤ì´ ì‚¬ìš©ë˜ê³  ìˆë‹¤. ì´ë¥¼ ë¶„ì„ í•˜ê³  í•„ì ë˜í•œ ì´ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•´ë³´ë ¤ ë…¸ë ¥í•˜ë©´ì„œ ì¡°ê¸ˆ ë” ì´ ë¶€ë¶„ì„ ê³µë¶€í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆê²Œ ë˜ì—ˆë‹¤.

ì´ ê¸€ì„ ë§ˆì¹˜ë©´ì„œ ë‹¤ì‹œ ëŒì•„ë³´ê²Œ ëœ ë¡œë³´ì½”ë“œëŠ”, ë¡œë³´ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ê°œë°œí•œ ì‚¬ëŒì˜ ëª©ì ì¸ â€˜ JAVA êµìœ¡ íˆ´ â€™ì— ë”± ë“¤ì–´ë§ì•˜ë‹¤.

ë‹¤ì‹œ ê¸€ì„ ë³µì›í•˜ë©´ì„œ ì•„ì£¼ ì¡°ê¸ˆì€ ì†ì„ ë³´ì•˜ì§€ë§Œ ê·¸ë˜ë„ ì•„ì‰¬ìš´ ë¶€ë¶„ì´ ì¡°ê¸ˆ ìˆë‹¤. ì•„ë‹ˆ ë§ì´ ìˆë‹¤. í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ê·¸ê²ƒì„ ì „ë¶€ ì¶©ì¡±ì‹œí‚¤ê¸°ì—ëŠ” ë¡œë³´ì½”ë“œë¥¼ í•œì§€ ì˜¤ë˜ë˜ì–´ì„œ ìš”ë‹¨ê°•ì„ ë„˜ì–´ ê¸°ì–µ ì €í¸ì— ìˆëŠ” ì•„ì´ë“¤ì´ í•„ìš”í•˜ê¸°ì— í•  ìˆ˜ ì—†ì—ˆë‹¤. ì¡°ê¸ˆ ì•„ì‰¬ì›€ì´ ë‚¨ëŠ” ë¶€ë¶„ì€ ì•„ë˜ì˜ ì½”ë“œë¡œ ëŒ€ì²´í•˜ê³ ì í•œë‹¤.

SampleíŒ€ê³¼ì˜ ì „íˆ¬ í˜¹ì€ ë§ì€ ì¸ì›ê³¼ì˜ ì „íˆ¬ê°€ ì£¼ë¡œ ì´ë£¨ì–´ì§€ëŠ” ê²½ìš°ì—ëŠ” ì ì–´ë„ íŒ€ ë¡œë´‡ ì¤‘ í•˜ë‚˜ë¥¼ ê¸°ë³¸ ë¡œë´‡ ì¤‘ì— ìˆëŠ” "Walls"ì´ë¼ëŠ” ë¡œë´‡ì„ ë°”íƒ•ìœ¼ë¡œ ë§Œë“¤ë©´ ìƒì¡´ì„ ë†’ì¼ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. "Walls"ë¼ëŠ” ë¡œë´‡ì€ ë²½ì„ íƒ€ê³  ëŒì•„ë‹¤ë‹ˆê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ë§ì€ ê·œëª¨ì˜ ì‹¸ì›€ì‹œì— ì ì´ ê³µë©¸í•˜ê¸°ê¹Œì§€ ì‹œê°„ì„ ë²„í‹°ëŠ”ë° ë„ì›€ì´ ëœë‹¤.

ì•„ë˜ëŠ” Sample ë¡œë´‡ "Walls"ì˜ ì½”ë“œì´ë‹¤.

/***********************************************************************
     * Copyright (c) 2001-2013 Mathew A. Nelson and Robocode contributors
     * All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
     * are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0
     * which accompanies this distribution, and is available at
     * http://robocode.sourceforge.net/license/epl-v10.html
   ***********************************************************************/
    package sample;


    import robocode.HitRobotEvent;
    import robocode.Robot;
    import robocode.ScannedRobotEvent;

    import java.awt.*;


    /**
   * Walls - a sample robot by Mathew Nelson, and maintained by Flemming N. Larsen
   * <p/>
   * Moves around the outer edge with the gun facing in.
   *
   * @author Mathew A. Nelson (original)
   * @author Flemming N. Larsen (contributor)
   */
    public class Walls extends Robot {

        boolean peek; // Don't turn if there's a robot there
        double moveAmount; // How much to move

        /**
       * run: Move around the walls
       */
        public void run() {
            // Set colors
            setBodyColor(Color.black);
            setGunColor(Color.black);
            setRadarColor(Color.orange);
            setBulletColor(Color.cyan);
            setScanColor(Color.cyan);

            // Initialize moveAmount to the maximum possible for this battlefield.
            moveAmount = Math.max(getBattleFieldWidth(), getBattleFieldHeight());
            // Initialize peek to false
            peek = false;

            // turnLeft to face a wall.
            // getHeading() % 90 means the remainder of
            // getHeading() divided by 90.
            turnLeft(getHeading() % 90);
            ahead(moveAmount);
            // Turn the gun to turn right 90 degrees.
            peek = true;
            turnGunRight(90);
            turnRight(90);

            while (true) {
                // Look before we turn when ahead() completes.
                peek = true;
                // Move up the wall
                ahead(moveAmount);
                // Don't look now
                peek = false;
                // Turn to the next wall
                turnRight(90);
            }
        }

        /**
       * onHitRobot:  Move away a bit.
       */
        public void onHitRobot(HitRobotEvent e) {
            // If he's in front of us, set back up a bit.
            if (e.getBearing() > -90 && e.getBearing() < 90) {
                back(100);
            } // else he's in back of us, so set ahead a bit.
            else {
                ahead(100);
            }
        }

        /**
       * onScannedRobot:  Fire!
       */
        public void onScannedRobot(ScannedRobotEvent e) {
            fire(2);
            // Note that scan is called automatically when the robot is moving.
            // By calling it manually here, we make sure we generate another scan event if there's a robot on the next
            // wall, so that we do not start moving up it until it's gone.
            if (peek) {
                scan();
            }
        }
    }

ì•„ë˜ëŠ” Sample ë¡œë´‡ "Walls"ì„ ë°”íƒ•ìœ¼ë¡œ ë§Œë“  ì½”ë“œì´ë‹¤.

    package avangers;

    import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
    import robocode.*;
    import robocode.util.Utils;
    import java.awt.Color;
    import java.awt.geom.*;
    import java.util.*;
    import java.security.cert.*;



    public class Hulk extends Avanger {

        /* ì  ë³€ìˆ˜ ì„ ì–¸ ë° ì €ì¥ */
        Hashtable targets;            // ì ì˜ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ í•´ì‹œ í…Œì´ë¸”ì— ì €ì¥
        Enemy target;
        Enemy trackTarget=null;

        /*ë³€ìˆ˜ ì„ ì–¸ */
        final double PI = Math.PI;    

        int hitBullet=0;
        int hitWall=0;
        int hitMyBullet=0;
        int dodgeCount=0;
        double bulletBearing;
        int teamCount=3;
        boolean live=true;
        boolean eLive=true;

        double gapX;
        double gapY;
        double gap;

        double move;

        /* ì—­í•  íŒŒíŠ¸*/
        boolean leader;
        boolean dodgeMan;

        /* ë ˆì´ë” ë¶€ë¶„ */
        Radar rad;

        /* ì „ëµë¶€ë¶„ */
        TournamentStrategy tStrategy;

        /* íšŒí”¼ ì°¸ì¡° ë³€ìˆ˜ */
        Dodge dodD;
        WallSmooth dodW;
        DodgeBullet dodB;

        public void run() {

            /* ì  ë³€ìˆ˜ ì´ˆê¸°í™” */
            targets = new Hashtable();
            target = new Enemy(this, 0.0D, 0.0D, 0.0D, 0.0D, 0.0D, 0.0D, 0L, 0.0D,"Loki", 0.0D, 0.0D);

            /* ë¡œë´‡ ì„¤ì • ë¶€ë¶„ */
            setAdjustGunForRobotTurn(true);
            setAdjustRadarForGunTurn(true);

            setColors(Color.GREEN, Color.ORANGE, Color.BLACK);

            /*ë ˆì´ë” ë¶€ë¶„*/
            turnRadarRightRadians(2*PI);
            rad=new Radar(this,targets);

            /*ë¦¬ë” ì²´í¬ ë¶€ë¶„ */
            leader=isLeader();

            /* ì „ëµë¶€ë¶„ */
            tStrategy = new TournamentStrategy(this,targets);

            dodD= new Dodge(this,targets);
            dodW=new WallSmooth(this,targets);
            dodB=new DodgeBullet(this,targets);


            /* ë²½ìœ¼ë¡œ ì´ë™*/            
            if(eLive){
                move = Math.max(getBattleFieldWidth()-18-getX(), getBattleFieldHeight()-18-getY());
                turnLeft(getHeading() % 90);
                ahead(move);
                turnRight(90);
            }

            while(true) {

                rad.meleeRadar(this);            

                /* ë²½ì— ì¶œëŒì„ ìµœì†Œí™” ë° ê²½ë¡œ ì´íƒˆì‹œ ì¬ ì§„ì… */
                if(eLive){
                    if(getX()<=30&&getY()<=30){
                        ahead(600-getY()-18);
                        turnRight(90);
                    }
                    else if(getX()<=30&&getY()>=570){
                        ahead(800-getX()-18);
                        turnRight(90);
                    }
                    else if(getX()>=770&&getY()>=570){
                        ahead(getY()-18);
                        turnRight(90);
                    }
                    else if(getX()>=770&&getY()<=30){
                        ahead(getX()-18);
                        turnRight(90);
                    }
                    else if(getY()<=30){
                        ahead(getX()-18);
                        turnRight(90);
                    }
                    else if(getX()<=30){
                        ahead(600-getY()-18);
                        turnRight(90);
                    }
                    else if(getY()>=570){
                        ahead(800-getX()-18);
                        turnRight(90);
                    }
                    else if(getX()>=770){
                        ahead(getY()-18);
                        turnRight(90);
                    }
                    else{
                        move = Math.max(getBattleFieldWidth()-18-getX(), getBattleFieldHeight()-18-getY());
                        turnLeft(getHeading() % 90);
                        ahead(move);
                        turnRight(90);    

                    }
                }
                //tStrategy.tStrategyTo12();

                /*ì  ë¦¬ë”ê°€ ì‚¬ë§ì‹œ ë“œë¡œì´ë“œ ì œê±°ë¥¼ ìœ„í•´ ë²½ì—ì„œ ì´ë™ íƒˆì¶œ*/
                if(!eLive)
                    dodW.wallSmoothMove();

                execute();
            }
        }


        /* ìŠ¤ìº” Event */
        public void onScannedRobot(ScannedRobotEvent e) {

            /* ì  Data ìƒì„± ë° ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ */
            Enemy en;

            if(!isTeammate(e.getName()))
                if (targets.containsKey(e.getName())) {
                    en = (Enemy)targets.get(e.getName());
                    en.update(e.getEnergy(), getX() + e.getDistance() * Math.cos(Math.toRadians(normalRelativeAngle(90.0D - (getHeading() + e.getBearing())))), getY() + e.getDistance() * Math.sin(Math.toRadians(normalRelativeAngle(90.0D - (getHeading() + e.getBearing())))), e.getHeading(), e.getBearing(), e.getVelocity(), getTime(), e.getDistance(), e.getHeadingRadians(), e.getBearingRadians());
                } 
                else {
                    en = new Enemy (this, e.getEnergy(), getX() + e.getDistance() * Math.cos(Math.toRadians(normalRelativeAngle(90.0D - (getHeading() + e.getBearing())))), getY() + e.getDistance() * Math.sin(Math.toRadians(normalRelativeAngle(90.0D - (getHeading() + e.getBearing())))), e.getHeading(), e.getBearing(), e.getVelocity(), getTime(), e.getDistance(), e.getName(), e.getHeadingRadians(), e.getBearingRadians());
                    targets.put(e.getName(),en);
                }

            gapX = e.getDistance() * Math.cos(Math.toRadians(normalRelativeAngle(90.0D - (getHeading() + e.getBearing()))));
            gapY = e.getDistance() * Math.sin(Math.toRadians(normalRelativeAngle(90.0D - (getHeading() + e.getBearing()))));
            gap = Math.toDegrees(Math.atan2(gapX, gapY));

            turnGunRight(Utils.normalRelativeAngleDegrees(gap - getGunHeading()));
            if(!isTeammate(e.getName()))
                /* ê±°ë¦¬ 200 ì´í•˜ */
                if(e.getDistance()<=200){
                    setBulletColor(Color.RED);
                    fire(3);
                }
                /* ê±°ë¦¬ 500 ì´í•˜ */
                else if(e.getDistance()<=500){
                    setBulletColor(Color.YELLOW);
                    fire(3);
                }

                /* ê±°ë¦¬ 500 ì´ìƒ */
                else{
                    setBulletColor(Color.BLACK);
                    fire(3);
                }

        }

        /* ì  ë¡œë´‡ì˜ ìƒì‚¬ ìœ ë¬´ Event */
        public void onRobotDeath(RobotDeathEvent e) {
            if(isTeammate(e.getName())) // íŒ€ì›ì¸ ê²½ìš° íŒ€ì› ìˆ«ìë¥¼ í•œëª… ì¤„ì„
                teamCount--;
            else{
                Enemy en = (Enemy)targets.get(e.getName());
                en.live = false;
                if(en.eLeader)
                    eLive=false;
            }

        }

        /* ì ê³¼ ì¶©ëŒ í–ˆì„ ë•Œ */
        public void onHitRobot(HitRobotEvent e) {
            if (e.getBearing() > -90 && e.getBearing() < 90) {
                back(100);
            }
            else {
                ahead(100);
            }
        }


        /* ì ì— ì˜í•´ í”¼íƒ„ ë‹¹í–ˆì„ ë•Œ Event. ë°©í–¥ ë³€í™˜ì— ì‚¬ìš©*/
        public void onHitByBullet(HitByBulletEvent e) {
            Enemy en = (Enemy)targets.get(e.getName());

            hitBullet++;
            dodgeCount++;
            if(dodgeCount>10)
                dodgeCount=0;        
            bulletBearing=e.getBearing();

        }

        /* ì ì„ í”¼ê²©í–ˆì„ ë•Œ Event */
        public void onBulletHit(BulletHitEvent e){
            hitMyBullet++;
        }

        /* ë²½ì— ì¶œëŒí–ˆì„ ë•Œ Event */
        public void onHitWall(HitWallEvent e) {

            hitWall++;
        }

        /* íŠ¹ì • ì¢Œí‘œë¡œ ì´ë™ */
        void goTo(double x, double y){
            double angle = normalAbsoluteHeading(Math.toDegrees(1.570796326794897D - Math.atan2(getY() - y, getX() - x)));
            int dir = 1;
            double distance=0;

            angle = normalRelativeAngle(getHeading() - angle + 180.0D);
            if (angle > 90.0D)
            {
              angle -= 180.0D;
              dir = -1;
            }
            else if (angle < -90.0D)
            {
              angle += 180.0D;
              dir = -1;
            }

            distance=Math.pow((x-getX())*(x-getX())+(y-getY())*(y-getY()), 0.5);
            setTurnLeft(angle);

            ahead(distance * dir);

        }

        /* ë¦¬ë” í™•ì¸ ë©”ì†Œë“œ */
        boolean isLeader(){
            if(getEnergy()>200)
                return true; // ë¦¬ë”
            return false; // ë…¸ì˜ˆ

        }

        /* ì ˆëŒ€ ê°ë„ ê³„ì‚° */
        public double normalAbsoluteHeading(double angle){
          if (angle < 0.0D) {
            return 360.0D + angle % 360.0D;
          }
          return angle % 360.0D;
        }

        /* ìƒëŒ€ ê°ë„ ê³„ì‚° */
        public double normalRelativeAngle(double angle){
          if (angle > 180.0D)
            return (angle + 180.0D) % 360.0D - 180.0D;
          if (angle < -180.0D)
            return (angle - 180.0D) % 360.0D + 180.0D;
          return angle;
        }

        /* ë³€ìˆ˜ ë°˜í™˜ í•¨ìˆ˜ */
        int getDodgeCount() {
            return dodgeCount;
        }

        int getHitBullet() {
            return hitBullet;
        }

        int getHitWall() {
            return hitWall;
        }

        int getHitMyBullet() {
            return hitMyBullet;
        }

        int getTeamCount() {
            return teamCount;
        }

        double getBulletBearing() {
            return bulletBearing;
        }

        boolean getLeader() {
            return leader;
        }

        boolean getDodgeMan() {
            return dodgeMan;
        }

    }
